How to Install the new Swift Playgrounds App on your iPad

Apple introduced the new Swift Playgrounds app at WWDC yesterday, which lets you edit playgrounds directly on your iPad. Googling yields tons of posts about its exsitence, but it’s not obvious how developers can actually install it. As it turns out, it’s simple.

The Swift Playgrounds app is bundled with iOS 10.

Install iOS 10 on your iPad and you’ll be good to go.
